query.from: v_arrivallist a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_arrival a
b_receiveinspection a
b_PurchaseStockIn a
b_InventoryRecord a
v_arrivallist a LEFT JOIN v_arrivalquantitygroup c ON c.contractId = a.contractId AND c.materialId = a.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_inventory a WHERE SUBSTRING(a.materialId FROM 1 FOR 1)='K' AND a.deleteflag='0'
v_purchaseorderdetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'

v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN v_arrivalquantitygroup b ON b.contractId = a.contractId AND b.materialId = a.materialId LEFT JOIN b_arrival c ON c.contractId = a.contractId AND c.materialId = a.materialId AND c.deleteFlag='0' AND c.arrivalId = '#'
v_receiveinspetionList a LEFT JOIN b_purchaseorderdetail b ON b.contractId=a.contractId AND b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'

v_receiveinspetionList a LEFT JOIN b_purchaseorderdetail b ON b.contractId=a.contractId AND b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetail d ON d.arrivelId = a.arrivalId AND d.materialId = a.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'

( SELECT a.recordId AS recordId, a.YSId AS YSId, a.contractId AS contractId, a.materialId AS materialId, c.materialName AS materialName, c.unit AS unit, c.purchaseType AS purchaseType, a.supplierId AS supplierId, concat(e.supplierId,'（',e.shortName,'）',e.supplierName ) AS supplierName, a.arrivalId AS arrivalId, date_format(a.inspectTime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS inspectTime, a.quantityQualified AS quantityQualified, d.quantity AS contractQuantity, ifnull(d.contractStorage, '0') AS contractStorage, a.deleteFlag AS deleteFlag, d.status AS status, d.price AS price, d.deliveryDate, a.checkerId AS checkerId, a.checkResult, f.reverse, f.quantity AS stockinQty, f.depotId, date_format(a.checkDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS checkDate, ifnull(date_format(f.checkInDate,'%Y-%m-%d'),'待入库') AS checkInDate, ifnull(f.receiptId, '') AS receiptId, ucase( concat_ws( ',', f.receiptId, a.materialId, c.materialName, e.supplierId, a.contractId, f.checkInDate, a.arrivalId, a.YSId ) ) AS fullField FROM v_receiveinspection a LEFT JOIN b_material c ON a.materialId = c.materialId AND (c.deleteFlag = '0')
LEFT JOIN b_supplier e ON e.supplierId = a.supplierId AND (e.deleteFlag = '0')
LEFT JOIN v_purchaseorderdetail d ON d.contractId = a.contractId AND ( d.materialId = a.materialId ) AND (d.deleteFlag = '0')
LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetail f ON f.arrivelId = a.arrivalId AND a.materialId = f.materialId AND (f.deleteFlag = '0') WHERE a.checkResult='020' OR a.checkResult='030' ) a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' and A.quantityQualified > '0'
v_purchaseStockInById a LEFT JOIN b_pricereference b ON b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_purchaseStockInById a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_inspectionreturn a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_InspectionReturn a
v_purchaseStockInById a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_receiveinspection a LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetail b ON a.contractId=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId AND a.arrivalId=b.arrivelId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_purchasestockinbyid a LEFT JOIN s_user b ON b.userId=a.keepUser AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_purchasestockinbyid a LEFT JOIN s_user b ON b.userId=a.keepUser AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.stockinType='010'
v_materialcheckinlist a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' and A.quantityQualified > '0'
v_purchaseorderdetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
v_stockinapplylist a LEFT JOIN s_user c ON c.userId=a.userId AND c.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_stockinapply a
b_arrival a LEFT JOIN b_material b ON b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' LEFT JOIN s_user c ON c.userId=a.userId AND c.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'

( SELECT a.recordId AS recordId, a.YSId AS YSId, a.contractId AS contractId, a.materialId AS materialId, c.materialName AS materialName, c.unit AS unit, c.purchaseType AS purchaseType, a.supplierId AS supplierId, concat( e.supplierId, '（', e.shortName, '）', e.supplierName ) AS supplierName, a.arrivalId AS arrivalId, date_format( a.inspectTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS inspectTime, a.quantityQualified AS quantityQualified, d.quantity AS contractQuantity, ifnull(d.contractStorage, '0') AS contractStorage, a.deleteFlag AS deleteFlag, d.status AS status, d.price AS price, d.deliveryDate, a.checkerId AS checkerId, a.checkResult, f.reverse, f.quantity AS stockinQty, f.depotId, date_format(a.checkDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS checkDate, ifnull( date_format( f.checkInDate, '%Y-%m-%d' ), '待入库' ) AS checkInDate, ifnull(f.receiptId, '') AS receiptId, ucase( concat_ws( ',', f.receiptId, a.materialId, c.materialName, e.supplierId, a.contractId, f.checkInDate, a.arrivalId, a.YSId ) ) AS fullField FROM v_receiveinspection a LEFT JOIN b_material c ON a.materialId = c.materialId AND (c.deleteFlag = '0') LEFT JOIN b_supplier e ON e.supplierId = a.supplierId AND (e.deleteFlag = '0') LEFT JOIN v_purchaseorderdetail d ON d.contractId = a.contractId AND ( d.materialId = a.materialId ) AND (d.deleteFlag = '0') LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetail f ON f.arrivelId = a.arrivalId AND a.materialId = f.materialId AND (f.deleteFlag = '0') WHERE a.checkResult='020' OR a.checkResult='030' ) a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' and A.quantityQualified > '0'
v_arrivalfrompurchaseorder a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND replace(a.contractStorage,',','')+0 < replace(quantity,',','')+0 -- AND left(a.materialId,1) <>'H'
v_arrivalfrompurchaseorder a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' -- AND left(a.materialId,1) <>'H' #
v_purchaseorderdetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
b_InventoryHistory a left join b_material b ON b.materialId = a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' left join s_user c ON c.userId=a.createPerson AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
v_depotReturn a
v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockin_groupby_ysid_materialid b ON a.YSId=b.ysid AND a.materialId=b.materialId LEFT JOIN v_orderdetail c ON a.YSId=c.YSId

f.name: IF (REPLACE (IFNULL(e.stockinQty, 0),',', '') >= REPLACE (IFNULL(e.quantity, 0),',',''), 0,IF (REPLACE (IFNULL(a.unitQuantity, 0),',','') * REPLACE (IFNULL(e.quantity, 0),',','') - REPLACE ( IFNULL(b.quantity, 0), ',','') < 0, 0, REPLACE (IFNULL(a.manufactureQuantity, 0),',','') - REPLACE ( IFNULL(b.quantity, 0), ',','')))

query.from: ( SELECT a.YSId AS YSId, a.materialId AS materialId, b.materialName AS materialName, a.deleteFlag, a.unitQuantity, format(sum( REPLACE (a.totalRequisition, ',','' )),2) AS manufactureQuantity FROM b_purchaseplandetail a JOIN b_material b ON b.materialId = a.materialId AND (b.deleteFlag = '0') WHERE a.deleteFlag='0' AND A.materialId = '#' GROUP BY a.YSId ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.YSId AS YSId, a.materialId AS materialId, COUNT(a.materialId) countQty, sum( REPLACE ( ifnull(a.quantity, 0), ',', '' ) ) AS quantity FROM b_stockoutdetail a LEFT JOIN b_stockout b ON a.stockOutId = b.stockOutId AND b.deleteFlag = '0' WHERE (a.deleteFlag = '0') AND a.materialId = '#' GROUP BY b.YSId ) b ON a.materialId = b.materialId AND instr(b.ysid, LEFT(a.ysid, 8)) > 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.YSId, a.materialId, b.materialName,a.completedQuantity, if(IFNULL(c.quantity,0)<=0,ifNULL(a.completedQuantity,0),IFNULL(c.quantity,0)) stockinQty, a.quantity FROM b_orderdetail a JOIN b_material b ON a.materialId=b.materialId LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockin_groupby_ysid_materialid c ON a.ysid=c.ysid AND a.materialId = c.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag='0') e ON e.ysid=a.ysid WHERE A.deleteFlag = '0' AND LEFT(a.YSId,2) > 17

v_purchasestockindetail a LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetailgroup b ON a.YSId=b.YSId AND a.contractId=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId LEFT JOIN v_purchaseorderdetail c ON c.contractId =a.contractId AND c.materialId=a.materialId

( SELECT a.YSId,a.materialid,SUM(REPLACE(b.quantity,',','')) requisitionQty,
IF(a.requisitionType = 1, if(REPLACE(a.purchaseQuantity,',','') > REPLACE(a.manufactureQuantity,',',''), REPLACE(a.manufactureQuantity,',',''), REPLACE(a.purchaseQuantity,',','') ), REPLACE(a.manufactureQuantity,',','') ) manufactureQty
FROM v_purchaseplan a LEFT JOIN v_stockout b ON a.ysid=b.ysid AND a.materialid=b.materialid WHERE a.supplierId <> '0574YH00' AND a.ysid='#' group by a.ysid,a.materialid order by a.materialid ) a
s_dic a WHERE EnableFlag='0'
v_purchasestockindetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'

v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.contractId, e.materialId, SUM(REPLACE(e.quantityInspection,',','')) quantityInspection, SUM(REPLACE(e.quantityQualified,',','')) quantityQualified, SUM(IFNULL(REPLACE(e.quantityInspection,',',''),0) - IFNULL(REPLACE(e.quantityQualified,',',''),0)) refundQty FROM v_receiveinspection e WHERE e.contractId = '#' GROUP BY e.contractId,e.materialId ) b ON b.contractId = a.contractId AND b.materialId = a.materialId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.contractId, f.materialId, SUM(REPLACE(f.quantity,',','')) arrivalQty FROM b_arrival f WHERE f.deleteFlag='0' AND f.contractId = '#' GROUP BY f.contractId,f.materialId ) d ON d.contractId = a.contractId AND d.materialId = a.materialId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.contractId, a.materialId, COUNT(a.materialId) matcnt, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), 0)) stockinRtnQty, SUM( if(IFNULL(a.reverse,'0') = '0', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''),0)) stockinQty, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', (-1)*REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''))) netStockinQty FROM v_purchasestockindetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.contractId='#' GROUP BY a.contractId,a.materialId ) e ON a.contractId=e.contractId AND a.materialId=e.materialId LEFT JOIN s_user c ON c.UserID = a.purchaser AND (c.DeleteFlag = '0') WHERE 1=1

( SELECT a.contractId, a.materialId, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), 0)) stockinRtnQty, SUM( if(IFNULL(a.reverse,0) = '0', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''),0)) stockinQty, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', (-1)*REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''))) netStockinQty FROM v_purchasestockindetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.contractId='#0' AND a.materialid='#1' GROUP BY a.contractId,a.materialId ) a

( SELECT a.contractId, a.materialId, replace(a.quantity,',','')+0 contractQty, b.netStockinQty, IF( IFNULL(b.netStockinQty,0) >= replace(a.quantity,',',''),0,1) stockinSts FROM v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.contractId, a.materialId, COUNT(a.materialId) matcnt, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), 0)) stockinRtnQty, SUM( if(IFNULL(a.reverse,'0') = '0', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''),0)) stockinQty, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', (-1)*REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''))) netStockinQty FROM v_purchasestockindetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.contractId='#' GROUP BY a.contractId,a.materialId ) b ON a.contractId=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.contractId='#' ORDER BY a.materialId ) a

v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.contractId, a.materialId, SUM( REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', '') - ( REPLACE(IFNULL(b.quantityInspection,0),',', '') - REPLACE(IFNULL(b.quantityQualified,0),',','')) ) netArrivalQty FROM b_arrival a LEFT JOIN v_receiveinspection b ON a.arrivalId=b.arrivalId AND a.contractid=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE (a.deleteFlag = '0') AND a.contractId='#0' AND a.materialId='#1' GROUP BY a.contractId, a.materialId ) c ON a.contractId=c.contractId AND a.materialId=c.materialId
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.contractId, a.materialId, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), 0)) stockinRtnQty, SUM( if(a.reverse = '1', (-1)*REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', ''), REPLACE(a.quantity, ',', '')) ) netStockinQty FROM v_purchasestockindetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.contractId='#0' AND a.materialId='#1' GROUP BY a.contractId,a.materialId ) b ON a.contractId=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId
WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.contractId='#0' AND a.materialId='#1'
s_WarehouseCode a

( SELECT a.codeId, a.codeName, a.recordId, a.parentId, a.subId, a.multiLevel, a.sortNo, a.effectiveFlag, a.remarks, substring_index( substring_index( a.codeType, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',',-1 ) codeType FROM ( SELECT a.codeId, a.codeName, a.codeType, a.recordId, a.parentId, a.subId, a.multiLevel, a.sortNo, a.effectiveFlag, a.remarks FROM s_warehousecode s JOIN s_warehousecode a ON s.sortNo = SUBSTR(a.sortNo FROM 1 FOR LENGTH(s.sortNo)) WHERE s.codeId='#' ) a LEFT JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( length( a.codeType ) - length( REPLACE ( a.codeType, ',', '' ) ) + 1 )
ORDER BY codeType ) a LEFT JOIN b_materialcategory b ON a.codeType=b.categoryId
s_warehousecode a where a.parentId='0'
